argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | isinito.b | |- B = ( Base ` C ) |
| 2 |  | isinito.h | |- H = ( Hom ` C ) |
| 3 |  | isinito.c | |- ( ph -> C e. Cat ) |
| 4 |  | isinito.i | |- ( ph -> I e. B ) |
| 5 | 3, 1, 2 | #P_zerooval | |- ( ph -> ( ZeroO ` C ) = ( ( InitO ` C ) i^i ( TermO ` C ) ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_eleq2d | |- ( ph -> ( I e. ( ZeroO ` C ) <-> I e. ( ( InitO ` C ) i^i ( TermO ` C ) ) ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_elin | |- ( I e. ( ( InitO ` C ) i^i ( TermO ` C ) ) <-> ( I e. ( InitO ` C ) /\ I e. ( TermO ` C ) ) ) |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_syl6bb | |- ( ph -> ( I e. ( ZeroO ` C ) <-> ( I e. ( InitO ` C ) /\ I e. ( TermO ` C ) ) ) ) |
